（废弃）P1-03：佣兵团演习
title: 佣兵团演习
desc: 拉维耶组织了一场佣兵团内部的“欢迎会”，通过一场对战演习来欢迎你的到来。

name: （废弃）P1-10：别扭的法卡尔
title: 荒野巡逻
desc: 有商人报告小镇附近出现了狼群，为了确保小镇赖以生存的商路的畅通，佣兵团必须将它们尽数消灭。

name: （废弃）P1-17：守护铃兰之剑：遭袭版
title: 守护铃兰之剑
desc: 小镇突然遭到了匪徒的袭击，马上出击，拯救民众！

name: （废弃）P1-18：守护铃兰之剑：防卫版
title: 守护铃兰之剑
desc: 我们不能完全相信线人的情报，但做好防范总是没错的，以小镇的工事为基础，迎击匪徒吧！

name: 护送年轻富商
（废弃）P3-09-01集结号：骑士团→政府军
title: 集结号
desc:
尊敬的铃兰之剑佣兵团：
  骑士团临时召开会议决定，暂且放弃攻城计划。
  为了防备伊利亚军追击，现委托铃兰之剑佣兵团为光荣的殿军。为骑士团主力部队争取撤退时间，并且阻击伊利亚追兵。
  骑士团随后会召集兵力前来支援，帮助撤退，请无需担心。

name: （废弃）P1-19：守护铃兰之剑：剿匪版
title: 守护铃兰之剑
desc:
我们决定相信线人提供的情报，主动出击，防患于未然，将匪徒一网打尽。
那名线人可能还在匪徒中，尽可能营救他吧。

name: （废弃）P3-04-04：酒馆混战
title: 旅店混战
desc: 法拉瓦尔军团的士兵在小镇旅店里和你手下的佣兵打了起来，但确实很难说谁对谁错……

name: （废弃）P3-04-05：协助收编部队
condition2_name: 成功收编游侠团加入法拉瓦尔军团
title: 协助收编部队-有生力量
desc: 一群山贼打算加入骑士团和法拉瓦尔军团，但同时黑暗之光也在蛊惑他们加入，尽量争取他们加入。

name: （废弃）P3-07-01与歌洛莉亚并肩作战
title: 与歌洛莉亚并肩作战
desc: 歌洛莉亚率领的骑士团的小分队正在附近作战，如果我们提供帮助，胜利会唾手可得。

name: （废弃）P3-08-01血腥的要塞攻城战
title: 血腥的要塞攻城战
desc: 对十字路口的进攻已经全面展开，但事情真的会那么顺利吗……

name: 委托战斗模板-刘晓鹏测试

title: Guild Trial: Bronze
desc: Your opponents in the mercenary rank test have arrived in the town. Defeat them and upgrade your mercenary rank!

name: （废弃）P3-04-06：袭击秘密警察的据点
title: 袭击特工的据点
desc: 一座小镇一直受到倒吊人的控制，当地村民苦不堪言，去帮助他们赶跑这些倒吊人。

name: （废弃）P5-02：第二次十字路会战系列01
title: 第二次十字路会战系列01

title: 第二次十字路会战系列02

title: 强袭罗迪斯帝国营地

name: （废弃）小镇发展系列-02-篱笆事件

（废弃）P4-07-01：调查——倒吊人
condition2_name: 至少幸存一名特工内线
title: 调查——倒吊人
desc: 拉维耶在倒吊人内部有几个“朋友”，他们掌握了一些惨剧的信息，去看看他们知道什么。

name: （废弃）P4-07-01：调查——教皇国的动向
title: 调查——罗迪斯帝国的动向
desc: 歌洛莉亚送来了情报，罗迪斯帝国在悲剧当天派人在海之都活动，目前已经探明了他们的据点，突袭看看能不能找到情报。

name: （废弃）P4-07-01：调查——可疑的自由军头目
condition2_name: 任务完成时只击倒目标1人
title: 调查——可疑的法拉瓦尔军团头目
desc: 歌洛莉亚送来了情报，有一名法拉瓦尔军团头目可能和海之都悲剧有所牵扯，希望你抓捕并审讯他……但为什么歌洛莉亚不自己做？

name: 黑暗之光卷土重来系列-驱散黑暗
title: Darkness Dispelled
desc:
Leader, the future of the town is in your hands. We are ready to defend the town to death. Please give your order!
Leader!

name: 支线-在自由军面前露一手
condition2_name: 不暴露行动的情况下靠近目标

name: 酒馆招募事件组-拯救薇尔德舞娘
title: Save the Vlderian Dancer
desc:
A Vlder archer issues you a Quest to defeat a gang of slave traders and save her trafficked sister.
She can't afford the fee, but she will join your Mercenary Group after that.

name: （废弃）小镇发展系列-01-流民事件
title: 退治恶狼
desc: 似乎有浪涌城逃出的难民在小镇附近遭到了狼群的袭击，解决掉这些狼群，应该可以多救几个人吧。

name: （废弃）小镇发展系列-02-商队事件
title: 夺回商路
desc: 商路一直是小镇赖以生存的命脉，溃兵恶霸一样的行径不能容忍，夺回桥梁吧！

name: （废弃）小镇发展系列-04-邻村救援事件
title: 邻村救援
desc: 名为黑暗之光的邪教组织正在威胁邻村，据了解，和一般的匪徒不同，他们是真的会屠杀整个村子的，去保护无辜的村民吧！

name: QV3-P3追加委托01：浪涌军的作战演练
title: Operational Drill of the Waverun Legion
desc:
The newly arrived Waverun Legion is seriously lacking in battle ability, and the casualty rate of new recruits on the battlefield is worrying. If the situation cannot be improved, the Waverun Legion may suffer heavy losses.
Therefore, they invite you to train the soldiers and improve their survival ability.

name: （暂不入版本）帮助骑士团教训教皇国
title: 信仰之争
desc: 罗迪斯帝国的学者在附近布道，骑士团希望你们能阻止“异端”的传播。

name: QV3-P3追加委托03：反击之浪
title: Wave of Counterattack
desc: The nearby town is often extorted by the Hanged Men. Go help the townspeople and drive out these greedy guys.

name: QV3-P3追加委托02：救援溃兵
condition2_name: Cover 3 soldiers of the Waverun Legion to successfully escape
title: Rescue the Routed Troops
desc: The Waverun Legion intended to destroy Darklight nearby, but it was ambushed and hit hard. Go to rescue the retreating soldiers and stop Darklight.

name: 紧急遭遇战测试1-分支
title: 测试1-可重试可认输
desc: 遭遇战测试1-可重试可认输

title: 遭遇战测试标题

title: 落难王子

title: 黑暗降临

title: 贯穿黑暗之枪

name: （废弃）P4-02-01家书：夺回包裹：骑士团→土匪
condition2_name: 任意连续的2回合内击倒6个敌人
title: 家书
desc:
尊敬的铃兰之剑佣兵团：

现在有一个委托任务，希望您能帮忙取回被山贼抢走的一个包裹，这些山贼还真有些棘手。

name: （废弃）P4-03-02：保护三王女
title: 保护三王女
desc:
特工并非真正的军队，他们更擅长压制敌人，使其失去战斗能力。
集中局部优势，逐个歼灭他们的话，特工的战术将不再有效。

name: （废弃）P4-05-01：击退索菲亚
title: 击退索菲亚
desc: 索菲亚是一名诡计多端的战术大师，与他的对抗需要的不是勇猛，而是料敌机先的智慧，

name: 沙盒指令表现测试
title: 沙盒指令表现测试
desc: 沙盒指令表现测试委托，结算和过期都会触发事件

name: （废弃）P4-08-02：调查地牢
title: 调查地牢
desc: 特工的阵型松散，而我方占有高地，如果能防守住唯一路口的话……

name: （废弃）P5-04：十字路要塞攻略战（未清扫教皇国）（1）
title: 十字路要塞攻略战
desc: 奥古斯特大人已经将河对岸的敌人击溃，而佣兵团需要尽快对着城门发起突击，否则城墙上的投石机将再一次将我们击溃。

name: （废弃）P5-04：十字路要塞攻略战（已清扫教皇国）（1）
title: 十字路要塞攻略战
desc: 奥古斯特大人已经将河对岸的敌人击溃，而佣兵团需要尽快对着城门发起突击，否则城墙上的投石机将再一次将我们击溃。

name: （废弃）P6-03：追捕歌洛莉亚
title: 追捕歌洛莉亚
desc:
即使歌洛莉亚已被追捕，但他的亲卫们依然选择忠于她。
想要抓捕歌洛莉亚的话，必须先排除卫队的干扰。

name: 安定度事件-黑暗之光的报复
title: Darklight's Revenge
desc: It can't be! They're at the gate! We're ready defend the town and awaiting orders!

name: 通用事件：行会的试炼：C级
title: Guild Trial: Silver
desc: Your opponents in the mercenary rank test have arrived in the town. Defeat them and upgrade your mercenary rank!

name: 通用事件：行会的试炼：B级
title: Guild Trial: Gold
desc: Your opponents in the mercenary rank test have arrived in the town. Defeat them and upgrade your mercenary rank!

name: 通用事件：行会的试炼：A级
title: Guild Trial: Platinum
desc: Your opponents in the mercenary rank test have arrived in the town. Defeat them and upgrade your mercenary rank!

name: 紧急遭遇战测试2-必胜
title: 测试2-可重试不可认输
desc: 遭遇战测试2-可重试不可认输

name: 紧急遭遇战测试3-必败
title: 测试3-不可重试可认输
desc: 遭遇战测试3-不可重试可认输

name: QV3-P3-01-01协助骑士团1-清扫王国军游击队
title: Eliminate the Guerrillas
desc: The King's Army's spies are all over the city, and its guerrillas even frequently disturb your army. Just knock them all out before taking the city.

name: QV3-P3-01-01协助骑士团2-扩充浪涌军
condition2_name: Successfully persuade the militia to surrender.
title: Expand the Waverun Legion
desc: As the Waverun Legion is growing more and more powerful, its urgent task is to find more soldiers. However, the civilians have been doubting the Waverun Legion all the time, making things hard in the recruitment process.

name: QV3-P3-01-01协助骑士团3-袭击特工据点
title: Attack the Agents' Stronghold
desc: The battlefield intelligence of the King's Army is transmitted by agents, which makes the King's Army very responsive. Destroy the agents' stronghold and throw them into confusion!

name: QV3-P3-01-01协助骑士团4-保护浪涌军粮道
condition2_name: At least 1 person in the Waverun Legion's Transport Team survives
title: Protect the Supply Line
desc: Although the agents' stronghold has been destroyed, the supply line of the Waverun Legion, which was exposed, is being attacked by the King's Army. Only by protecting the supply line, can you have no worries when taking the city.

name: QV3-P3-01-01：与歌洛莉亚的演习
title: Drill with Gloria
desc: This is a simulated training battle with Knight Gloria, which should be both friendly and serious.

name: QV3-P3-04-01剿灭营地附近王国军
title: Destroy Nearby Camp Forces
desc: The Union has made a battle plan, which will leave the Sword of Convallaria as a bait in the camp until the Union returns and sieges the King's Army. It's a great challenge for the Sword of Convallaria, because it will have to bear some fierce attacks from the King's Army alone in a long time.

name: QV3-P3-05-01鲁特菲的委托
title: Lutfi's Quest
desc: The agents of the King's Army are looting and destroying the towns in the front line, and some townspeople who escaped successfully come to you for help. At such a time, the Sword of Convallaria and Lutfi decide to protect the miserable townspeople.
condition1_name: Escort the civilians to the destination

name: QV3-P3-05-0歌洛莉亚的委托
condition2_name: No civilians are knocked back, and Gloria is not "endangered"
title: Gloria's Quest
desc: The agents of the King's Army are looting and destroying the towns in the front line, and some townspeople who escaped successfully come to you for help. At such a time, the Sword of Convallaria and Gloria decide to meet head-on the agents.

name: QV3-P3-06-01攻占瞭望塔
condition2_name: No more than 1 soldier of the Union is defeated
title: Take the Watchtower
desc:
A scout brings an intelligence: Gloria's troops are stationed somewhere near a watchtower of the King's Army. 
It seems that Gloria is ready to attack the watchtower, and if you do her a favor, her victory will be in sight.

name: （废弃）QV3-P3-11-01帮助自由军
title: 解放之火
desc: 随着骑士团一起到来的还有刚刚组建的“法拉瓦尔军团”。它的成分非常复杂，由贫民，雇佣兵，投机者与前王国军组成，尽管“推翻王国暴政”这个共同的目标让他们维系着最基本的军队纪律，但这只明显缺乏训练，装备不足的军队看上去很难在战场上发挥出可观的战斗能力。

name: QV3-P3-08-01与骑士团的共同作战
condition2_name: Lutfi's soldiers are not all knocked back
title: Fight Together with the Union
desc: Fight together with the Union to destroy the supply base of the King's Army.

name: QV3-P3-12-01老兵永不死【考验】
title: [Trial] Old Soldiers Never Die
desc: An old knight issues you a Quest. Although realizing his aging and weakness, he still wants to prove himself. Therefore, he asks you for help.

name: QV3-P3-13-01俘虏拯救战【考验】
title: [Trial] Save the Captives
desc: A soldier of the Waverun Legion asks for your help, hoping to break down the northern prison camp of the King's Army.

name: QV3-P4-01十字路口攻城战1-接应浪涌军间谍
title: Support the Waverun Legion Spy
desc:
A spy of the Waverun Legion, who got the defense map of the 
Crossroads Keep and was founded, is being chased by the defenders.
His intelligence is decisive for the war. Go to rescue him!
condition1_name: Escort the spies to the evacuation point.
failed_desc: The spy of the Waverun Legion is defeated

name: QV3-P4-01十字路口攻城战2-王国军的夜袭
title: Night Attack of the King's Army
desc: According to Lutfi's intelligence, the King's Army is about to launch a counterattack at night by attacking your camp and destroying the siege weapons. Hold your ground and beat them off.

name: QV3-P4-01十字路口攻城战3-探查下水道
title: Check the Sewers
desc: The Waverun Legion plans to infiltrate into the Crossroads Keep through the sewers. You need to cooperate with them to check whether the sewers are passable.

name: QV3-P4-02-01支援鲁特菲
title: Support Lutfi
desc: Lutfi seems to need more battle support. The supply line is so important that the secret Hanged Men even begins to take actions.

name: QV3-P4-02-02支援歌洛莉亚
title: Support Gloria
desc: Gloria seems to need more battle support. The desperate King's Army is likely to cross the Rubicon at this time. You should fight against them carefully because it is very risky.

name: QV3-P4-03-01最终十字路攻略战
title: Final Crossroads Siege Battle
desc: The King's Army is crouching in the Keep. It is the right time to destroy them and clear the way to victory.

name: QV3-P4-03-01平息冲突
title: Defuse the Conflict
desc: The refugee unrest in the Town of Convallaria is getting worse, and you must quell it as soon as possible before it gets out of control.

name: QV3-P4-10：针锋相对
title: Tit for Tat
desc: Safiyyah and Gloria are at loggerheads, and a war of words is inevitable. The truth becomes more complicated and uncertain, but you should not easily change your mind.

name: QV3-P4-08-01保护神秘女孩
title: Protect the Mystery Girl
desc: The girl who was saved in Waverun City seems to have an important identity. She may be in danger at any time in the crowd. It is urgent for you to protect her...

name: 共通线-第一章：佣兵团演习
title: Mercenary Group Drills
desc: Rawiyah organizes a battle drill inside the Mercenary Group as a "welcome party" for you.
condition1_name: Guide Maitha to win the drill

name: （废弃）QV3-P2：护送修女【考验】
title: 【考验】护送医者
desc: 前来救助难民的医者已动身出发，你需要将其安全护送至铃兰小镇。

name: （废弃）QV3-P2：黑暗之光的传教
title: 与黑暗之光的初次交锋
desc: 邪教“黑暗之光”正在难民营进行宣讲，难民们如果被骗，很可能会被奴役甚至是被蛊惑成为帮凶，必须阻止他们！

name: （废弃）QV3-P1-27：救下小魔女
title: 清剿山贼
desc: 近期，一些来路各异的盗匪集团活跃在铃兰小镇的周边。就在刚才，你收到了骑士团的命令：剿灭小镇西南方向郊外的一伙山贼。骑士团的斥候探查到了这伙山贼的位置，很显然骑士团也无法容忍那些盗匪，但他们并不想自己出力解决问题。

name: （废弃）QV3-P2：神秘的晶石01
title: 护送神秘货物
desc: 一名商人请求铃兰之剑护送一批货物，而当被问起密封着的货物是什么时，他却闪烁其辞。你唯一清楚的是：这批货物不容有失。

name: （废弃）GT1-P1：清理狼群
title: 清理狼群
desc: 你接到报告，小镇附近突然出现了狼群，有一只商队被困，法卡尔已经独自先出发了，抓紧支援他！

name: （废弃）QV3-P1-14：加强治安
title: 加强治安
desc: 越来越多的难民来到了小镇上，铃兰之剑必须加强巡逻，以维持小镇的治安。

name: （废弃）QV3-P1-17：守护铃兰之剑：遭袭版
title: 守护铃兰之剑
desc: 紧急情况！小镇遭到了攻击！流窜在小镇周围的匪徒绕开了你的警戒直接袭击了小镇。立即组织防御，尽可能拯救镇民！

name: （废弃）QV3-P1-18：守护铃兰之剑：防卫版
title: 守护铃兰之剑
desc: 就如同线人所提供的情报一样，匪徒果然前来袭击了小镇。迎击！让这些匪徒有来无回！

name: （废弃）QV3-P1-19：守护铃兰之剑：剿匪版
title: 守护铃兰之剑
desc: 之前的难民小偷给你提供了附近的山贼营地的位置，你决定先发制人，主动出击。注意，线人也在营地里，尽量保护他的安全。

name: 普通委托-共通线-第二章：护送粮食
title: Convoy Escort
desc: In order to provide relief to the victims, the Union plans to transport grains to Waverun City for distribution. For safe delivery, the Union issued a Quest to provide an escort.
failed_desc: More than 5 grain crates are destroyed.

name: 普通委托-共通线-第二章：晶石交易
title: Trade of Luxite
desc: The Union has recently occupied several small Luxite mines in Iria. In order to protect the Luxite, the Union issues you a Quest to convey the Luxite safely from these mines to the destination.
condition1_name: Collect 3 crates of Luxites / Defeat at least 9 enemies

name: 普通委托-共通线-第二章：突袭骑士团前哨营地
title: Assault the Union's Outpost Camp
desc: Although the Papal States and the Union maintain a harmonious relationship, their dispute on the territory of Iria never stops. The Papal States issued the Sword of Convallaria a Quest, asking it to raid on the Union and force them to withdraw from the occupied area.

name: 普通委托-共通线-第二章：解救人质
title: Hostage Rescue
desc: The bandits kidnapped a Radiant Servant of the Papal States on his way to the refugee camp and asked the Papal States to ransom the hostage. The Papal States issued the Sword of Convallaria a Quest to rescue the Radiant Servant.

name: 普通委托-共通线-第二章：清除路障
title: Clear the Path
desc: Knights of the Union have set up temporary defenses along the border to monitor the Papal States. As a result, the Papal States issued a request to clear these lines.
condition1_name: More than one Stockade in each line of defense is destroyed/Defeat at least 9 enemies

name: 普通委托-共通线-第二章：以逸待劳
title: Tactical Counterattack
desc: The King's Army has been attacked by rebel forces, prompting them to call upon the Sword of Convallaria for aid. You hold the line of defense at a key position of your own choosing, ready to take the fight back to them.

name: 普通委托-共通线-第二章：破坏黑暗之光仪式
title: Destroy Darklight's Ritual
desc:
A gang of rioters of Darklight occupied an old castle. The King's army issued the 
Sword of Convallaria a Quest to break it down. After thinking a moment, you decide to raid on them.

name: 普通委托-共通线-第二章：狙击受雇山贼
title: Kill the Targeted Bandits
desc: The King's Army even hired bandits to harry the logistics of the Union. Because the Union is not familiar with the nearby terrain, it issued the Sword of Convallaria a Quest to raid on the base camp of these bandits.

name: （废弃）QV3-P2-03：偷渡
condition2_name: 选择帮助王国军或难民
title: 偷渡
desc: 难民们提出了偷渡过河的请求，佣兵团可以选择帮助他们，或者……

name: （废弃）QV3-P2-03：招募争端
condition2_name: 帮助先遣骑士团或罗迪尼亚法皇国
title: 招募争端
desc: 骑士团与罗迪尼亚法皇国在难民营里因为征兵问题爆发了冲突，虽然两边都是外来势力，但铃兰之剑还是得优先驱逐一个不那么值得被信任的一方。
condition1_name: 支持任意一方击败对手

name: （废弃）QV3-P2-05：落难王子
title: 落难王子
desc: 铃兰之剑开始着手解决难民营粮食短缺的燃眉之急。在骑士团控制的浪涌城，或许能顺利采购到足够的粮食。

name: （废弃）QV3-P2-06：圣光教派传教
title: 光之道宣讲
desc:
骑士团和罗迪斯帝国不仅在政治上有冲突，宗教信仰上也属于不同的派系，罗迪斯帝国信奉正统法皇之道，而骑士团信奉光之道。
因此，在难民营里爆发了一场信仰冲突，来此地宣教的罗迪斯帝国法皇之道学者，和怀着同样目的来到此地的光之道学者闹得难解难分，一场围绕信仰的战斗在所难免。

name: （废弃）QV3-P2-07：护送二王子
title: 护送鲁特菲
desc: 铃兰之剑之前救下的那名商人希望主角将他们护送回浪涌城，作为报答，他可以提供粮食购买的渠道。不管是对于难民还是对于小镇，这些粮食都是至关重要的……
condition1_name: 抵达目标地点或消灭所有敌人

name: （废弃）QV3-P2-09：黑暗之光与晶石贸易
title: 黑暗之光与晶石贸易
desc: 骑士团希望你前往矿坑城押运一批重要的晶石，此行可能很危险，请保持警惕。

name: （废弃）QV3-P2-12：孤立无援上
title: 孤立无援
desc: 黑暗之光的大军已逼近小镇，而你只能独自带领兵力有限的佣兵团进行防御。

name: 共通线-第二章：坚守小镇-骑士团
title: Hold the Town
desc: Darklight is approaching the town, and before the reinforcements of the Union arrive, you must lead the Sword of Convallaria Mercenary Group to block Darklight.

name: QV3-P5-02-歌洛莉亚调查委托系列02：断线的风筝
title: A Kite out of Control
desc: After knowing the bad news of Rawiyah, two members of the Hanged Men said that they had some information about the Waverun City tragedy and wanted to share it with you.
failed_desc: Leader of the Mercenary Group is defeated

name: QV3-P5-02-歌洛莉亚调查委托系列01：夜袭自由军
title: Night Attack on the Waverun Legion
desc: A senior official of the Waverun Legion may be linked to the Waverun City tragedy. It is inconvenient for Gloria to handle that by herself, so she hopes you can help her capture the man

name: QV3-P5-02-歌洛莉亚调查委托系列03：第三个势力
title: The Third Faction
desc: According to the intelligence, some Rodinians conducted secret activities on the day of the Waverun City tragedy. Capture them.
failed_desc: Crates containing operation records of Papal States are all destroyed.

name: QV3-P5-02-歌洛莉亚调查委托系列04：财富之下
title: Under the Wealth
desc: A wealthy merchant in Waverun City took the opportunity to corner the market after the tragedy. Maybe he has some clues.

name: QV3-P4-先锋营【考验】（泽维尔）
title: [Trial] Spear of Iria
desc: Go to intercept the newly compiled "Spear of Iria" of the King's Army.

name: QV3-P4-瓮中捉鳖【考验】（泽维尔）
title: [Trial] A Rat in a Hole
desc: The Union has located the command post of the "Spear of Iria". Take action to solve the biggest problem.

name: QV3-P4-泽维尔普通战斗委托1-袭击训练营
title: Attack on the Training Camp
desc: The King's Army is seriously short of sophisticated soldiers, and can only conscript young men to expand it. The Union has located a recruit training center of the King's Army. Break down the camp and save these civilians who will be pushed into battle.
condition1_name: Defeat 3 officers of the King's Army

name: QV3-P4-泽维尔普通战斗委托2-法师末路
title: Conjurer's Demise
desc: The King's Army conjurer, Meryl, wields formidable power. It's time to take her down.
condition1_name: Defeat Chaplain officers of the King's Army

name: QV3-P4-泽维尔普通战斗委托3-要塞侦察
title: Reconnaissance of the Keep
desc: The Order and the Waverun Legion have sieged the Crossroads Keep again. You need to conduct reconnaissance before the final attack.
condition1_name: Investigate suspicious spots inside the Crossroads Keep

name: QV3-P5-04-萨曼莎普通战斗委托1-切断中枢
title: Cut off the Command Post
desc: The Union has located a front-line command of the Papal States of Rodinia, from where you can get the secret intelligence of the Papal States of Rodinia.

name: QV3-P5-04-萨曼莎普通战斗委托2-袭击法皇之手
title: Attack on the Bishop
desc: The Bishop of the Papal States of Rodinia appointed to Iria will hold an assembly of his followers near the old capital. Go to disrupt the assembly and make the followers lose faith in the Papal States of Rodinia.

name: QV3-P5-04：萨曼莎事件战斗委托2-与审判者交战【考验】
title: [Trial] Fight Against the Judge
desc: To response your ongoing attacks, the Papal States has to send the best troops. Defeat them all.

name: QV3-P5-04：萨曼莎事件战斗委托1-审判者【考验】
title: [Trial] The Judge
desc: A camp of the Order suffered a crushing blow. Go to support it right now. Attention: The attackers may be extremely powerful. Please take care.

name: QV3-P5-05：歌洛莉亚的调查1-蝙蝠之影-骑士团通用路线
title: Shadow of Bat
desc: An agent of the Hanged Men was involved in the Waverun City tragedy. Capture him and then find the truth.
condition1_name: Defeat the agent of the Hanged Men
failed_desc: The agent of the Hanged Men successfully escapes

name: （废弃）
title: 击退罗迪斯帝国
desc: test

name: (废弃）
title: 重创王国军
desc: test

name: QV3-P5-09：歌洛莉亚的调查2-刻意推迟-二王子线（歌洛莉亚求援）
title: Gloria Calls for Backup
desc: After a while, you receive a rescue signal from Gloria, and you immediately lead your team to the scene.

name: QV3-P5-10：歌洛莉亚的调查3-迟来的真相-二王子线
title: Belated Truth
desc: Teadon died suddenly, and Lutfi brought new evidence. You must find Gloria as soon as possible, and give her the evidence... She must be all right.

name: QV3-P5-13：歌洛莉亚的调查2-紧急援救-歌洛莉亚线
title: Emergency Rescue
desc: You decide to trust Gloria and save her informant. Go right now!
failed_desc: The informant is defeated or all allies are defeated

name: QV3-P6-歌洛莉亚线：十字路口会战·决战1-1-城外对决
title: Suburban Battle
desc: Instead of obeying the orders of Magnus, the supreme commander of the King's Army, an Iria nobleman, is to challenge the Order with his subordinates outside the city. Cooperate with the knights to make these guys realize how foolish and poor they are.

name: QV3-P6-二王子线：十字路口会战·决战1-1-城外对决
title: Suburban Battle
desc: Instead of obeying the orders of Magnus, the supreme commander of the King's Army, an Iria nobleman, is to challenge the Order with his subordinates outside the city. Cooperate with the knights to make these guys realize how foolish and poor they are.

name: QV3-P6-歌洛莉亚线：十字路口会战·决战2-截杀信使
title: Kill the Messenger
desc:
The King's Army has retreated to the city. Due to the noble general's rash advance, the effective strength in the city suffered serious losses, so Magnus decided to ask for help from Mornrays Castle. 
Kill the messenger to isolate the Keep.

name: QV3-P6-歌洛莉亚线：十字路口会战·决战3-烧毁粮仓
title: Burn down the Barn
desc: The inside man has gotten in touch with the Order. He can help our raiding troops infiltrate into the city and burn down the barn, making the enemies collapse without a battle.
condition1_name: Destroy the barn and then leave away

name: QV3-P6-歌洛莉亚线：十字路口会战·决战4-攻破要塞
title: Break down the Keep
desc:
After your efforts in the early stage, the strength of the Crossroads Keep has been greatly weakened. Therefore, in the early days, the Order launched a general attack on the Keep, and the Waverun Legion and the Sword of Convallaria were also requested to break through the city walls of the King's Army at all cost. 
After a bloody battle and at a heavy price, the Sword of Convallaria finally rushed up the city walls with the siege weapons. The next task is to find a way to open the city gate.

name: QV3-P6-二王子线：十字路口会战·决战2-截杀信使
title: Kill the Messenger
desc:
The King's Army has retreated to the city. Due to the noble general's rash advance, the effective strength in the city suffered serious losses, so Magnus decided to ask for help from Mornrays Castle. 
Kill the messenger to isolate the Keep.

name: 废弃
title: 歌洛莉亚线对骑士团的思辨2
desc: test

name: QV3-P6-二王子线：十字路口会战·决战3-烧毁粮仓
title: Burn down the Barn
desc: The inside man has gotten in touch with the Order. He can help our raiding troops infiltrate into the city and burn down the barn, making the enemies collapse without a battle.
condition1_name: Destroy the barn and then leave away

name: 普通遭遇战测试-常规
title: 普通遭遇战测试
desc: 普通遭遇战测试的描述
condition1_name: 普通遭遇战测试的胜利条件
failed_desc: 普通遭遇战测试的失败条件

name: QV3-P6-二王子线：十字路口会战·决战4-攻破要塞
title: Break down the Keep
desc:
After your efforts in the early stage, the strength of the Crossroads Keep has been greatly weakened. Therefore, in the early days, the Order launched a general attack on the Keep, and the Waverun Legion and the Sword of Convallaria were also requested to break through the city walls of the King's Army at all cost. 
After a bloody battle and at a heavy price, the Sword of Convallaria finally rushed up the city walls with the siege weapons. The next task is to find a way to open the city gate.

name: QV3-P6追加-战后委托系列02：搜刮遗留物资
title: Scavenge for Supplies Left Behind
desc: The Crossroads Battle II is over, leaving the battlefield littered with corpses. You may collect some military supplies from them.

name: QV3-P6追加-战后委托系列03：抓捕逃窜的伊利亚贵族
title: Capture the Escaped Iria Noblemen
desc: Some Iria noblemen escaped from the Keep during the siege battle. The Union knew the track of these noblemen, and ordered the Sword of Convallaria to capture them to prevent them from backing up the King's Army.

name: QV3-P6-战后委托系列01：清剿流兵
title: Eliminate the Defeated Soldiers
desc: The Crossroads Keep has been taken, but not completely pacified: Some soldiers of the King's Army in the Keep fled to the surrounding area of the Keep during the siege battle. The Union ordered the Sword of Convallaria to eliminate these soldiers to ensure the safety of the Keep.

name: QV3-P6-二王子线：招降王国军
condition2_name: Try to convert the defeated soldiers of the King's Army
title: Convert the King's Army
desc: A group of soldiers of the King's Army are operating nearby. The Union hopes that you can take care of them. If possible, induce them to surrender.

name: QV3-P6-歌洛莉亚线：消灭流寇
title: Eliminate the Roving Bandits
desc: Recently, a group of rampant bandits appeared near the town, causing chaos everywhere. They seemed to be very familiar with the hunting method of the Sword of Convallaria and repeatedly escaped... Fortunately, you caught them at the end.

name: QV3-P6-歌洛莉亚线：灯红酒绿
title: Debauchery
desc: The banquet is over. You must meet Gloria at the port immediately and kill the pursuers that might come.

name: QV3-P6-歌洛莉亚线：浪涌军哗变
title: Mutiny of the Waverun Legion
desc: Some soldiers of the Waverun Legion mutinied. The Union ordered you to suppress them. You'd better figure out what's going on.

name: QV3-P6：旅店斗殴【考验】
title: [Trial] Brawl at a Hotel
desc: Some members of the Mercenary Group have turned the argument into a brawl owing to the divergences about "whether the second siege battle with heavy casualties is a victory" and "whether the Union is trustworthy". Go stop them!

name: QV3-P6-歌洛莉亚线：寻找遗物
title: Search for Relics
desc: Search for a relic for your mercenary. You may encounter threats on the way. Please stay alert.

name: QV3-P7-歌洛莉亚线-03：奥古斯特的委托
title: Auguste's Quest
desc: Auguste sent you a Combat Quest. There is a small group of the King's Army on the road ahead, and you can easily kill them. Don't delay attacking them immediately!

name: QV3-P7-歌洛莉亚线-04：对战骑士团
title: Fight Against the Order
desc: The town was attacked by the Order. Please send troops immediately to defend it and protect the townspeople.

name: QV3-P7-歌洛莉亚线-05：寻回圣枪
title: Retrieve the Holy Lance
desc: Gloria's Holy Lance is not only a weapon for her to gallop on the battlefield, but also a symbol of the justice she upholds. Retrieve it and cheer Gloria up!

name: 废弃
title: 佣兵团备战01
desc: test

name: QV3-P7-歌洛莉亚线-08：保护歌洛莉亚
title: Protect Gloria
desc: A group of secret fighters have infiltrated into the town, and their target is probably Gloria. It's urgent. Go stop them!

name: QV3-P7-二王子线-02：王都决战，上
title: Final Battle of the Mornrays Castle, Part 1
desc: Launch an attack on the stronghold outside the Mornrays Castle to force Dantalion to surrender.

name: QV3-P7-二王子线-02：王都决战，中
title: Final Battle of the Mornrays Castle, Part 2
desc: The senior officials of the Hanged Men are boosting the morale of the King's Army at the front line. This is a great opportunity for you to kill them.

name: QV3-P7-二王子线-02：王都决战，下
title: Final Battle of the Mornrays Castle, Part 3
desc: Launch a huge attack on the Mornrays Castle to force Dantalion to send reinforcements and create opportunities for the doves in the city.

name: QV3-P7-歌洛莉亚线-17：奥古斯特的末路
title: Auguste's End
desc: In order to eradicate the last hidden danger, Auguste plans to execute Princess Inanna as soon as she is charged. The Sword of Convallaria will never allow him to distort the truth.
condition1_name: Defeat Auguste, Leader of the Order

name: QV3-P7-二王子线-战后巡逻01：平定匪患
title: Pacity the Bandits
desc: Although Iria has ushered in peace, the bandits are still rampant everywhere. Lutfi ordered the Sword of Convallaria to crusade against those outlaws and return peace to the civilians in the name of the Kingdom of Iria.

name: QV3-P7-二王子线-战后巡逻02：黑暗之光再袭
title: Darklight Returns
desc: Darklight continued to expand during the civil war. Although after the civil war, Iria tried to suppress this cult, they struggled desperately. The town is once again surrounded by the menacing Darklight.
condition1_name: Defeat 10 enemies / Defeat the enemy commander

name: QV3-P7-二王子线-战后巡逻03：最后的士兵
condition2_name: Subdue at least 2 soldiers of the King's Army.
title: The Last Soldier
desc: A squad of the King's Army is still operating under the banner of Dantalion. They are ragged and malnourished, but well-disciplined. Before the Order suppresses them, you may communicate with them to avoid a bloody battle.

name: QV3-P6：被遗弃的山贼团【考验】
title: [Trial] Abandoned Bandits
desc: Although the Papal States of Rodinia has retreated, a group of bandits are still operating in Iria under the name of the "Restoration Army". Go to kill them.

name: QV3-启动项-营救贝茨
title: Rescue Bates
desc: After several searches, it was found that the merchant Bates was kidnapped by a gang of bandits on the way. Please rescue him!

name: QV3-启动项-杀人偿命
title: Life for Life
desc: Kill the squad leader of the Papal States of Rodinia and avenge the death of the new friend in the Mercenary Group.

name: QV3-P5-04-萨曼莎普通战斗委托3-掠夺性开采
title: Predatory Mining
desc: The Papal States of Rodinia is conducting predatory mining of the Luxite mines in Iria. Go stop them.

name: QV3-启动项-雇佣兵招募事件-战斗1-中断搜查
title: Interrupt the Search
desc: The violent search by the King's Army has caused losses to the town. Please stop them immediately!

name: QV3-启动项-雇佣兵招募事件-战斗2-阻止行刺
title: Stop the Assassination
desc: One mercenary's suspicions came true, as he identified an seeker who infiltrated into the town. Protect the mercenary and catch the assaulter with him.

name: QV3-启动项-骑士团招募事件-战斗1-护送伤员
title: Escort the Wounded
desc: The Order was sieged by a squad of bandits when escorting the wounded. Please go to rescue them immediately and destroy the bandits.
failed_desc: The injured soldier of the Order is defeated

name: hydemo-普通战斗1
title: 一场战斗
desc:
这是一场战斗。
但是不建议你现在战斗。
由它去吧。

title: 一场战斗
desc:

但是不建议你现在战斗。
由它去吧。

name: 演出功能测试战斗
title: 演出功能测试战斗
desc: 演出功能测试战斗

name: QV3-P6-二王子线：十字路口会战·决战1-2-城外对决
title: Suburban Battle
desc: Instead of obeying the orders of Magnus, the supreme commander of the King's Army, an Iria nobleman, is to challenge the Order with his subordinates outside the city. Cooperate with the knights to make these guys realize how foolish and poor they are.

name: QV3-P6-歌洛莉亚线：十字路口会战·决战1-2-城外对决
title: Suburban Battle
desc: Instead of obeying the orders of Magnus, the supreme commander of the King's Army, an Iria nobleman, is to challenge the Order with his subordinates outside the city. Cooperate with the knights to make these guys realize how foolish and poor they are.

name: 共通线-第二章：孤立无援
title: Isolated and Helpless
desc: Darklight is approaching the town, but you can only defend it with the under-strength Mercenary Group.

name: （废弃）GT1-P1-07：山贼到来
title: 防守小镇
desc: 那支异常强大的山贼终究还是对小镇发起了全面进攻，这次铃兰之剑恐怕凶多吉少……

name: （废弃）GT2-P1-06：难民到来
title: 危险逼近
desc: 铃兰之剑最终还是选择前往受害的村落调查，向着烽烟燃起的方向前行，你与一支正在大肆破坏村落的土匪佣兵遭遇。

name: （废弃）GT2-P1-09：训练佣兵1
title: 新兵训练（一）
desc: 你受拉维耶所托去训练一批新加入铃兰之剑的新兵，你准备与他们展开一场模拟战。然而，这些新兵好像对战斗所知甚少。

name: （废弃）GT2-P1-09：训练佣兵2
title: 新兵训练（二）
desc: 经过一段时间的训练后，铃兰之剑的新兵渐渐开始掌握战斗技能。为了验证阶段性成果，你准备再次开展一场模拟战。

name: （废弃）GT2-P1-15：袭击山贼营地
title: 袭击山贼营地
desc: 在内线的帮助下，铃兰之剑找到了山贼营地，准备等待内线的暗号，对营地展开突袭。

name: （废弃）GT2-P1-16：新守护铃兰之剑
title: 守护铃兰之剑
desc: 山贼联军步步逼近，击退他们，保护好小镇！

name: （废弃）GT2-P1-13：小镇防御建设
title: 清剿狼群
desc: 一群野狼频频袭击小镇的伐木队，拉维耶与你决定带队前往森林深处剿灭它们。

name: 安定度事件-讨伐黑暗之光01
title: Counterattack Against Darklight
desc: Faced with the frequent looting of the refugees by Darklight, you and the Mercenary Group draw up a luring attack plan.

name: 安定度事件-讨伐黑暗之光02
title: Recapture the Town of Crossroads
desc: You agreed to Torg's request to protect this inconspicuous town from Darklight with the Sword of Convallaria.

name: 安定度事件-讨伐黑暗之光03
title: Take over the Mine of the Darklight
desc: The civil war lasted so long that the mineral supply of the town began to run out. Faycal found an old mine occupied by Darklight. Taking it over may temporarily guarantee the military supply of the Sword of Convallaria.

name: 安定度事件-讨伐黑暗之光04
title: Escape from the Darkness
desc: Some refugees near the Crossroads joined Darklight. When the town becomes their next target, you should lead the Sword of Convallaria to resist their attack.

name: 追加章节事件P5：伊利亚人还乡
title: Irians Return Home
desc: Some Irian soldiers requested you to escort refugees home with them. A group of the Hanged Men are waiting at the port.

name: 追加章节事件P5：解救骑士团俘虏
title: Rescue the Captives of the Order
desc: In order to prevent the Papal States from knowing the attack plan of the Union, Teadon invited you to ambush the troops of the Papal States escorting the captives of the Order, but you decided to rescue the captives first.
condition1_name: Rescue all captives within limited rounds.

name: 追加章节事件P3：狼群脱险
title: Out of the Wolf Pack
desc: Faycal accidentally attracted a nearby wolf pack while collecting food. Please go to support him.

name: 法卡尔个人事件-战斗01-寻找法卡尔
title: Search for Faycal

name: 法卡尔个人事件-战斗02-与法卡尔狩猎
title: Hunt with Faycal

name: 法卡尔个人事件-战斗03-森林决战
title: Final Battle in the Forest

name: 麦莎个人事件-战斗01-追讨盗贼
title: Chase the Bandits

name: 共通线-第一章：清剿狼群
title: Eliminate the Wolf Pack
desc: According to a merchant, a wolf pack appeared near the town. In order to ensure the trade route that the town lives by, the Mercenary Group must eliminate all the wolves.
failed_desc: The civilians or Faycal are defeated

name: 共通线-第一章：追捕魔女
title: Hunt the Sorceress
desc: The Papal States issued a wanted notice with a high reward, targeting a small sorceress who is extremely dangerous and odd.

name: 共通线-第一章：袭击强盗营地
title: Attack the Bandits' Camp
desc: The Sword of Convallaria has spotted the thugs who destroyed the neighboring village and are more destructive than the ordinary bandits.

name: 共通线-第一章：佣兵团来袭
title: A Mercenary Group Comes to Attack
desc: Fight the mercenary group who is here to take revenge.
condition1_name: Hold on for 6 rounds / Defeat at least 10 enemies

name: 共通线-第二章：采购粮食
title: Purchase Grains
desc: The Sword of Convallaria plans to address the urgent grain shortage in the refugee camp. In Waverun City controlled by the Union, it might be possible to purchase enough grains.

name: 共通线-第二章：护送商人
title: Escort the Merchant
desc: The merchant saved by the Sword of Convallaria hopes that it can escort him back to Waverun City. In return, he will provide some grain purchasing channels. Grains are so vital to both the refugees and the town...
failed_desc: The well-dressed young man is defeated

name: 共通线-第二章：异变魔物
title: Mutant Monsters
desc: Samantha and Beryl tried to rescue the patients but failed. The patients were changed into terrifying monsters by an unknown force. The tense situation becomes even more chaotic...

name: 共通线-第二章：护送难民渡河（有信标）
condition2_name: Defeat Nungal and Nergal, and no citizens are harmed
title: Escort the Refugees Across the River
desc: As the Iria River is blocked by the King's Army, a group of refugees from the north are stranded near the Town of Convallaria. They have nowhere else to go, while the Town of Convallaria can no longer provide assistance to them. As the King's Army is loosely guarded at night, the refugees hope that the Sword of Convallaria can accept the Quest to escort them across the river under the cover of the darkness.

name: 共通线-第二章：援助王国军
title: Assist the King's Army
desc: Right after the Sword of Convallaria reported the movement of Darklight, the King's army sent troops to resist Darklight. However, according to the intelligence sent back by the scouts, the soldiers of Darklight are much more than expected. The King's army needs further support.

name: 共通线-第二章：坚守小镇-王国军线
title: Hold the Town
desc: Darklight is approaching the town. Before the reinforcements of the King's army arrive, you must lead the Sword of Convallaria Mercenary Group to block the attack of Darklight.

name: 王国军线-第一章：伏击战
title: Head to Vlder Tribes
desc: Vlder Tribes is in the rugged and long mountain of Vltar Mountain. Even if you successfully arrive, you do not know how Vlderians will "treat" you. The thing you can rely on is the map and a letter of introduction given by NonoWill only.

name: 王国军线-第一章：摧毁埃拉曼设施
title: Destroy Elaman's Stronghold
desc: Although Iria currently has no dispute with Elaman, if you want to gain the support of Vlder Tribes, you have to first expel these Elaman mercenaries stationed in Vlder.

name: 王国军线-第一章：清除伏兵
title: Secret Meeting
desc: It seems that Dantalion intends to take you out of the house, but does not tell you the destination.
condition1_name: Trigger all ambush scenarios and defeat all enemies

name: 王国军线-第一章：十字路口会战·薇尔德
title: Crossroads Battle - Preparation
desc: The Crossroads Battle has already begun. Go help Vlder knock back the Union.

name: 王国军线-第一章：十字路口会战·王国军&萨曼莎
title: Crossroads Battle - Front Battlefield
desc: The main forces of the Union put tremendous pressure on the front, helping the King's Army to hold the line.

name: 王国军线-第一章：十字路口会战·露西亚
title: Crossroads Battle - The Right Flank
desc: Luccia is guarding a pass with the few soldiers. It needs sufficient supply for the protracted battle.
condition1_name: Hold on for 8 rounds / Defeat all enemies

name: 王国军线-第一章：十字路口会战·倒吊人上
title: Crossroads Battle - General Offensive
desc: Auguste will personally lead the army in a fierce attack to intercept this main force here.

name: 王国军线-第二章：击败阿里克赛
title: Masterpiece
desc: The Sword of Convallaria will perform a "bandit show" and attack the caravan escorted by Alexei.

name: 王国军线-第二章：联合教皇国剿灭黑暗之光
condition2_name: No character of the Papal States is knocked back.
title: Defeat Darklight
desc: When you arrived at the Mine Pit, Samantha's army had been waiting for you for a long time. For some reason, you felt more distant from Samantha than you did in the Crossroads Battle, since you haven't even had any communication about the battle plan. She and her troops simply gestured to the Sword of Convallaria and went straight into "Clean-up Operation".

name: 王国军线-第二章：调虎离山
condition2_name: Complete the investigation without defeating any enemies
title: Conduct In-depth Investigations
desc: The evidence that the Papal States won over Iria noblemen is hidden in this transit point. Be alert to the soldiers of the Papal States during the investigation.

name: 王国军线-第二章：他乡遇故知
title: Break Through the Encirclement
desc: You are pursued closely by the soldiers of the Papal States after getting the evidence. The only way to get away is to break through their encirclement.

name: 王国军线-第二章：剿灭叛军
title: Kill the Rebels
desc: The rebels have started a rebellion in the Mornrays Castle, and Dantalion is highly likely to be in danger.

name: 王国军线-第二章：帮助矿坑城
condition2_name: Edda or Inanna is not defeated
title: Help the Mine Pit
desc: By the time you arrived in the Mine Pit with weapons and supplies, the battle between the people here and the Darklight had reached its most intense stage. You and Inanna joined the fight together as soon as you distributed the weapons and supplies at the front after you arrived. The people didn't know who you were or where you came from, but they already believed in you and fought by your side.

name: 王国军线-第三章：第二次十字路口会战
condition2_name: No Banner is destroyed, and Magnus and Xavier are not defeated
title: Crossroads Battle II
desc: After regrouping, the Union made a comeback and launched a massive attack on the Crossroads Keep.
condition1_name: Hold on for 8 rounds / Defeat at least 12 enemies at the front gate

name: 王国军线-第三章：牺牲援军
title: Behind Enemy Lines
desc: Cut off the Union's supply lines as soon as possible. Not only will this open the Union to attack but also save our allies fighting on the front lines.

name: 王国军线-第三章：救二王子
condition2_name: You are no longer suspected by anyone
title: Rescue Lutfi
desc: Bypass the guards the Union and rescue Prince Lutfi from house arrest.
condition1_name: Complete the investigations for all targets

name: 王国军线-第三章：歼灭骑士团a
condition2_name: No more than 1 soldier of the King's Army at the dock is knocked back
title: Expel the Degenerate
desc: Enlist the support of the knights who uphold justice and expel the degenerate Auguste from Iria.

name: 王国军线-第三章：歼灭骑士团b
title: Kill the Invaders
desc: Kill all the troops of the Union that invade Iria.

name: 王国军线-第四章：杀马格努斯
title: Guardian of the Old King
desc: Magnus will be the last obstacle to depose Faris.

name: 普通委托-共通线-第一章：训练佣兵
title: Train the Mercenaries
desc: Recently, the Mercenary Group recruits a lot of novices, but it is not easy to train them up quickly. The wolves near the town can be taken as the novices' opponents in practical training.
failed_desc: All allies are defeated/The wolf pup successfully escapes

name: 普通委托-共通线-第一章：保护沿途难民
title: Protect the Refugees Along the Way
desc: The bandits along the way brutally killed many refugees who were gathering towards the town. The Sword of Convallaria Mercenary Group prepares to escort the refugees to the town safely.
failed_desc: All allies are defeated/ The civilians are slain

name: 普通委托-共通线-第一章：巡逻维持治安
title: Patrol to Keep Public Order
desc: The bandits have messed up the public order of the town. For the safety of the townspeople, it is necessary to strengthen the patrols outside the town. Try to improve the stability of the townspeople by patrolling.
condition1_name: Meet at least 4 people / Defeat all Outlaws

name: 普通委托-共通线-第一章：清剿山贼
title: Eliminate the Bandits
desc: The town, as a transit point for the refugees' supplies, is targeted by the bandits. Many bandits, who formed an alliance and occupied the nearby villages, are waiting for an opportunity to capture the town. If you don't kill them, it is hard to keep the town safe.

name: （废弃）
title: 薇尔德谈判委托01

name: （废弃）普通委托-共通线-第二章：协助王国军攻打盗匪
title: 协助王国军攻打盗匪
desc: 一群盗匪摧毁了十字路要塞前的村庄，王国军现已派遣先锋部队进攻盗匪的营地。这是一场可以赢得民心的战斗，为了确保万无一失，王国军向铃兰之剑发来助战委托。

name: 普通委托-王国军线-第一章：薇尔德谈判委托02
title: Risky Communication
desc: You have spotted a group of heavily armed Vlderians in the mountains. Communicate with them in a reliable way.

name: （废弃）重要委托-王国军线-第一章：晶石少女
title: 晶石少女

name: 普通委托-王国军线-第一章：防守十字路口战役01
title: Lay out the Defense Line
desc: Place some stockades around the Keep, which will play a role in the upcoming battle.
condition1_name: Defeat all enemies / Hold your ground for 5 rounds

name: 普通委托-王国军线-第一章：防守十字路口战役02
title: Rescue the Injured Soldiers
desc: Some injured soldiers of the King's Army are in the remote locations on the battlefield. Rescue them quickly.

name: 普通委托-王国军线-第一章：防守十字路口战役03（低优先级）
title: Escort the Messenger
desc: An important private letter that needs to be delivered to the client in time.
condition1_name: Arrive at the destination / Defeat all enemies

name: 普通委托-王国军线-第二章：打击黑暗之光01
title: Assault Darklight' Stronghold
desc: The scout reported a location of Darklight. Wipe them out.

name: 普通委托-王国军线-第二章：打击黑暗之光02
title: Search for Darklight
desc: Inquire the residents near the Mornrays Castle of the hiding place of Darklight.
condition1_name: Complete the investigation and defeat all enemies

name: 普通委托-王国军线-第二章：打击黑暗之光03
title: Pursue the Darklight Remnants
desc: Pursue the members of Darklight who managed to escape.

name: （废弃）普通委托-王国军线-第二章：帮助埃拉曼商人01
title: Help the Elaman Merchant 01

name: （废弃）普通委托-王国军线-第二章：帮助埃拉曼商人02
title: Help the Elaman Merchant 02

name: （废弃）普通委托-王国军线-第二章：来自银狼的委托
title: Silver Wolf's Request

name: 普通委托-王国军线-第三章：与骑士团的相关作战01
title: A Suspicious Grain Dealer
desc: A grain dealer and some knights are moving along a path forbidden to outsiders. Find out their intentions.
condition1_name: Defeat all enemies except the grain merchant
failed_desc: The grain dealer is defeated or all allies are defeated

name: 普通委托-王国军线-第三章：与骑士团的相关作战02
title: Infiltrate into the Reinforcement's Stronghold
desc: Place Luxite explosives in the camp of the reinforcement of the Union.
condition1_name: Place the gunpowder at 3 designated spots

name: （废弃）
title: Battle of the Order 03

name: 普通委托-王国军线-第三章：凑齐赎金01
condition2_name: Defeat at least three batches of enemies
title: [Trial] Tournament
desc: A merchant from Elaman holds a Tournament, and the winner will receive a substantial bonus.
condition1_name: Defeat at least 2 groups of enemies.

name: 普通委托-王国军线-第三章：凑齐赎金02
condition2_name: Defeat 4 Darklight followers except the sentinels
title: [Trial] Love Token
desc: A mysterious lady gave you a quest to go to the abandoned mine to find the remains of a miner who is her childhood sweetheart.

name: 普通委托-王国军线-第四章：抵抗入侵小镇的叛军
title: Eliminate the Rebels
desc: Eliminate the rebels who were reduced to bandits after being defeated in the war.

name: 普通委托-王国军线-第四章：训练起义军
title: Train the Insurgents
desc: Screw up the discipline of the recruits.

name: 普通委托-王国军线-第四章：收编流兵
title: Integrate the Defeated Soldiers
desc: Persuade the soldiers who were displaced in the war to defend the country.

name: 普通委托-王国军线-第四章：清剿匪患
title: Eliminate the Bandits
desc: Eliminate the bandits who are rampant during the post-war chaotic period.

name: 王国军线-第四章：泽维尔暗杀失败
title: Great Danger
desc: Today, you were reported that there were some strange climbing signs on the city wall. After analysis, you realize that Inanna is in danger.

name: 骑士团线翻新追加：保护二王子
title: Protect Prince Lutfi
desc: Lutfi was assassinated in a hotel of the town. Go immediately to protect him!

name: QV3-P3追加委托04：前哨战相关01-突破王国军前哨防线
title: Break Through the Outpost Line of the King's Army
desc: You reached a cooperation agreement with the Union, and they entrusted you to break through an outpost line built by the King's Army. This is a great opportunity to prove the Sword of Convallaria.
condition1_name: Arrive at the destination / Defeat all enemies

name: QV3-P3追加委托05：前哨战相关02-暗潮涌动
title: Turbulent Undercurrents
desc: A town is suffering from heavy taxation by the King's Army. There are many ways to rescue its residents, but it all depends on how you judge the situation and make your plan!
condition1_name: Arrive at 4 destinations / Destroy all suspicious supplies / Defeat all enemies

name: QV3-P3追加委托06：前哨战相关03-拼死坚守
title: Hold the Ground Desperately
desc: A station of the Order is fiercely attacked by the King's Army. The knights are guarding the banner of the Union and resisting stubbornly. You are ordered to rescue them. It must be a tough seesaw battle.
failed_desc: A banner is destroyed or all allies are defeated

name: QV3-P4追加委托01：打击王国军系列01-逃离火场
title: Survive the Fire
desc: In order to prevent the supplies from falling into your hands, the King's Army burned them as they retreated. As soon as it arrived, the Sword of Convallaria engaged in a fierce battle with the King's Army in the spreading fire.
condition1_name: Arrive at the destination / Defeat all enemies

name: QV3-P4追加委托02：打击王国军系列02-平原阻击战
title: Battle on the Plain
desc: The spearhead of the Order and the Sword of Convallaria have united, preparing to seize an important plain. However, the King's Army will not give away this strategic location.
condition1_name: Arrive at the destination / Defeat all enemies

name: （废弃）QV3-P4追加委托03：打击王国军系列03
title: 打击王国军03
desc: 浪涌军的一名间谍拿到了十字路要塞的布防图，却被守军发现遭到追踪。他的情报可以左右战局，去接应他吧！

name: QV3-P5追加委托01：打击王国军系列04-古城强袭战
title: Strike in the Old Castle
desc: The King's Army took an abandoned old castle as its front-line outpost and sent massive troops to defend it. The Order plans to take it, but it is too costly to attack by force. You have to think of other methods.

name: QV3-P5追加委托02：打击王国军系列05-冒火作战
title: Fight in the Fire
desc: A surprise army of the Order launched a fire attack on the camp of the King's Army. After that, you rushed into the camp, but met with the stubborn resistance of the surviving King's Army. It is destined to be a tough battle.

name: QV3-P5追加委托03：打击王国军系列06-城镇里的阴影
condition2_name: No more than 1 civilian is defeated.
title: Shadows in the Town
desc: A huge number of residents in the town were poisoned. According to the clues, it seems that some Darklight members have infiltrated into the town.

name: QV3-P6追加-战后委托系列04：战后委托04-伏击黑暗之光
title: Ambush Darklight
desc: The scouts detected that some Darklight fanatics attacked the merchants along the way and killed lots of innocent people in their ritual. You decide to launch a surprise attack on these mobs.

name: QV3-P6追加-战后委托系列05：战后委托05-小镇桥梁夺回战
title: Town Bridge Recapture Battle
desc: A group of refugees are hunted by Darklight. As long as they cross the river by the bridge, they can come to the Town of Convallaria for shelter. However, Darklight will not easily let these "preys" get away. The Sword of Convallaria must quickly take over the bridge to stop Darklight on the other side of the river!
condition1_name: Guard the bridge after taking it over.
failed_desc: The bridge is blown up by the explosive barrel

name: QV3-P6追加-战后委托系列06：战后委托06-夺回要员
title: Rescue the Bigwig
desc: An intelligence agent of the Union was captured by Darklight on his way back. You've accepted the Quest to rescue him, but it also means that you have to go deep into the controlled area of Darklight. Lots of unknown danger awaits you.
condition1_name: The bigwig arrives at the evacuation point / Defeat all enemies
failed_desc: The bigwig is defeated / The bigwig arrives at the escort point

name: QV3-P7--歌洛莉亚线-战后巡逻03-平定匪患
title: Pacity the Bandits
desc: Although Iria has ushered in peace, the bandits are still rampant everywhere. Prince Lutfi ordered the Sword of Convallaria to crusade against those outlaws and return peace to the civilians in the name of the Kingdom of Iria.

name: QV3-P7--歌洛莉亚线-战后巡逻02-黑暗之光再袭
title: Darklight Returns
desc: Darklight continued to expand during the civil war. Although after the civil war, Iria tried to suppress this cult, they struggled desperately. The town is once again surrounded by the menacing Darklight.
condition1_name: Defeat at least 10 enemies / Defeat the enemy commander

name: QV3-P7-歌洛莉亚线-战后巡逻01
condition2_name: Subdue at least 2 soldiers of the King's Army.
title: Post-war Patrol
desc: A small faction of the King's Army is still carrying the banner of Dantalion. They are ragged, malnourished, but disciplined. Go communicate with them before the Order arrives with their mission of suppression—maybe you can help prevent a bloody battle.

name: QV3-P7追加-歌洛莉亚线-定制委托01-解救骑士小队
title: Rescue the Knight Squad
desc: The headquarters of the Order entrusted you to rescue a knight squad that was sent to crusade against the bandits. According to the information provided by the headquarters, this small squad probably has been sieged by the bandits. Every second counts.

name: QV3-P7追加-歌洛莉亚线-定制委托02-胜利向谁微笑
title: Who Will Win
desc: A group of defeated soldiers of the King's Army are retreating, and you are going to circle to their rear and destroy them all. However, to your surprise, someone else is also interested in them.

name: QV3-P7追加-歌洛莉亚线-定制委托03-打扫战场
title: Clean the Battlefield
desc: You arrived at an old castle and thought that it was a camp of the bandits, but the sacrifice offerings there made you quickly realize that it was the habitation for Darklight. Act now!
condition1_name: Defeat at least 11 enemies within limited rounds
failed_desc: Fail to defeat enough enemies within limited rounds

name: 普通委托-共通线-第二章：破坏可疑物资
title: Destroy the Suspicious Supplies
desc:
The King's Army was informed that a group of enemies were trading suspicious supplies nearby. To prevent the supplies from flowing into the 
trading post, the King's Army entrusted you to destroy them.

name: 共通线-第二章：护送难民渡河（无信标）
condition2_name: Defeat Nungal and Nergal, and no citizens are harmed
title: Escort the Refugees Across the River
desc: As the Iria River is blocked by the King's Army, a group of refugees from the north are stranded near the Town of Convallaria. They have nowhere else to go, while the Town of Convallaria can no longer provide assistance to them. As the King's Army is loosely guarded at night, the refugees hope that the Sword of Convallaria can accept the Quest to escort them across the river under the cover of the darkness.

name: 通用事件：行会的试炼：S级
title: Guild Trial: Radiant
desc: Your opponents in the mercenary rank test have arrived in the town. Defeat them and upgrade your mercenary rank!

name: 普通委托-共通线-第一章：庇护所抓贼
title: Catch the Robbers of the Sanctuary
desc: A sanctuary in the nearby town was looted by a group of bandits. As the sanctuary is the confidence for the residents to survive, you must crack down on the robbers. Sweep up these robbers while they are loading the spoils!
failed_desc: All allies are defeated or the bandits successfully escape

name: 普通委托-共通线-第一章：霸道的流氓
title: Unruly Hooligans
desc: A group of hooligans took over the Training Ground of the town by force. They even planed to set up a camp and gather their men here. The Sword of Convallaria will never allow such a thing. Beat them hard.

name: 普通委托-共通线-第一章：拯救薇尔德舞娘
title: Save the Vlderian Dancer
desc: A Vlder dancer was ambushed by the slave traders near the town. Vlderians have been engaged in slave trade for a long time in Iria. Instead of sitting back, you lent a helping hand to the dancer.
failed_desc: The HP of Vlderian Archer or Vlderian Dancer falls below 10%

name: 普通委托-共通线-第二章：杀伐果断
title: Decisive Killing
desc: You received a Quest from the King's Army to hunt a group of bandits. After three days and three nights, the bandits finally chose to camp for rest. At this time, the commander of the King's Army ordered a decisive attack. Although exhausted, both sides still have to fight.

name: 普通委托-共通线-第二章：三个魔女
title: Three Sorceresses
desc: The Papal States issued a wanted notice and entrusted the Sword of Convallaria and the Pursuit Squad for the Sorceress to hunt down three sorceresses. It is said that in order to collect Luxite, the three sorceresses destroyed the Luxite mines wantonly with their secret Luxite Blessing. Catch them and lock them up!

name: 普通委托-共通线-第二章：误战
condition2_name: Avoid all allies on the battlefield being killed
title: Wrong Fight
desc: According to the orders of the Union, the Sword of Convallaria intended to eliminate a gang of bandits. However, when it arrived at the destination, an army was already there. At night, both sides started a fight before identifying each other.

name: 界面测试用-黑暗之光的报复
title: 【灾难】黑暗之光的报复
desc: 哦，天呐，是他们！他们又来了！兄弟们已经准备好誓死保卫小镇了，下令吧！团长！

name: 普通委托-王国军线-第一章：薇尔德谈判委托03-摧毁哨塔
title: Take Back the Plank Road
desc: Recapture a plank road occupied by the Union.

name: 普通委托-王国军线-第一章：薇尔德谈判委托01-薇尔德委托干黑暗之光
title: Sweeping Battle of Darklight
desc: Help Vlderians to drive away Darklight near Vltar Mountain.

name: 王国军线-第一章：十字路口会战·倒吊人下
title: Crossroads Battle - Counterattack
desc: The King's Army has shifted from defense to offense in the Crossroads battle. Cooperate with it to siege the Union.

name: 普通委托-王国军线-第一章：薇尔德谈判委托04
title: Alley for the Wolf Pack
desc: Clear away the proliferating vines and try to prevent the wolves from attacking the villages when taking a detour.
condition1_name: Destroy all vines / Defeat all wolves

name: 普通委托-王国军线-第一章：来自薇尔德舞团的委托1
title: Hospitality
desc: Vlderians hold a welcome banquet for the Sword of Convallaria. A unique competition is also waiting for the members of the Mercenary Group.

name: 普通委托-王国军线-第一章：来自薇尔德舞团的委托2
title: Hunt the Wolf King
desc: Vlderians came up with a good idea to hunt the Wolf King hiding in the cave.

name: 普通委托-王国军线-第一章：来自薇尔德舞团的委托3（低优先级）
title: Bandits in the Way
desc: Help the Vlderians wipe out a group of bandits who have seized the bridge.

name: 普通委托-王国军线-第一章：来自薇尔德舞团的委托4（低优先级）
title: Robbers' Ambush
desc: Work with the Vlderian strike force to attack a group of bandits on the mountain road from both sides.

name: 普通委托-王国军线-第一章：防守十字路口战役04
title: Clear the Threats
desc: Destroy the explosive barrels the Union are using for the siege.

name: 普通委托-王国军线-第一章：防守十字路口战役05
title: Enemy Capture Training
desc: Follow the Hanged Men to learn how to capture enemies on the battlefield.

name: 普通委托-王国军线-第二章：招兵买马系列委托01
condition2_name: Fight with two groups at the beginning
title: Loose Mercenaries
desc: Some idle mercenaries caused a riot in the tavern. Go to maintain the order.

name: 普通委托-王国军线-第二章：招兵买马系列委托02（低优先级）
title: Wolf Hunters
desc: An independent hunter is surrounded by a pack of wolves! Help him out!

name: 普通委托-王国军线-第二章：打击黑暗之光04
title: Fugitives of Darklight
desc: Some stubborn members of Darklight are going to return to their lost territory. Completely disillusion them.

name: 普通委托-王国军线-第二章：调查旧都系列委托1
title: Evacuate the Bigwig
desc: Evacuate the agent for land survey based at the Papal States compound.
condition1_name: Arrive at the investigation point within 3 rounds.

name: 普通委托-王国军线-第二章：调查旧都系列委托2
title: Intelligence Transmission
desc: Retrieve the intel your informant has hidden in the given location.

name: 普通委托-王国军线-第二章：调查旧都系列委托3
title: Break Through the Encirclement
desc: The reconnaissance has drawn the attention of the Papal States. You need to break through the enemy's blockade for retreat.
condition1_name: Arrive at the Specific Location / Defeat all enemies

name: 普通委托-王国军线-第二章：调查旧都系列委托4（低优先级）
title: Evacuate the Bigwig
desc: Use the traps laid in advance to help evacuate the survey agent from the Papal States compound.
condition1_name: Survey agent arrives at the destination / Defeat all enemies

name: 普通委托-王国军线-第二章：招兵买马系列委托03（低优先级）
title: Boulder Master
desc: Instruct the mercenary to use the boulder strategically and hit the unwary enemies.

name: 普通委托-王国军线-第二章：招兵买马系列委托04（低优先级）
title: Armed Bandits
desc: A group of bandits have snatched some fine equipment, posing a great threat to security.

name: 普通委托-王国军线-第三章：第二次会战系列委托1
title: Cut off the Supplies
desc: Destroy a supply camp built by the Union.

name: 普通委托-王国军线-第三章：第二次会战系列委托2
title: Ambush
desc: Choose an advantage point and be prepared to ambush the Union.

name: 普通委托-王国军线-第三章：第二次会战系列委托3（低优先级）
title: Encounter Battle with the Union
desc: Sword of Convallaria bumped into a Union squad on the march. Things got tense there…

name: 普通委托-王国军线-第三章：与骑士团的相关作战03（低优先级）
title: Attack the Union's Camp by Fire
desc: Attack while the Union's camp is on fire.

name: 普通委托-王国军线-第三章：与骑士团的相关作战04（低优先级）
title: Surround and Annihilate the Defeated Troops
desc: Surround and annihilate the defeated troops that fled from the Union's camp.

name: 普通委托-王国军线-第三章：战后整顿系列委托01
title: Knock Back the Wolf Pack
desc: Expel the wolves that harass the town.
condition1_name: Defeat 10 wolves / Defeat any Wolf King

name: 普通委托-王国军线-第三章：战后整顿系列委托02
title: Call Back the Homeless Refugees
desc: The big war is over. Persuade the refugees in the sanctuary to return to their hometowns.

name: 普通委托-王国军线-第三章：战后整顿系列委托03（低优先级）
title: Level-up Training
desc: Do some Level-up Training with a mercenary group of equal strength.

name: 普通委托-王国军线-第三章：战后整顿系列委托04
title: Dismantle the Fortifications
desc: Collect the resources that have been used for fortifications on the battlefield.

name: 普通委托-王国军线-第三章：战后整顿系列委托05
title: Illegal Mining
desc: Expel the bandits who illegally collect Luxite.
condition1_name: Hold on for 5 rounds / Defeat all enemies

name: 普通委托-王国军线-第三章：战后整顿系列委托06（低优先级）
title: Positional Warfare Training
desc: A training on how to manage positional warfare.
failed_desc: Fail to appease all civilians under [debuff] within the rounds.

name: 普通委托-王国军线-第三章：凑齐赎金03
title: [Trial] Ill-gotten Gains
desc: Collect a consignment of supplies looted by bandits.

name: 普通委托-王国军线-第四章：固守小镇系列委托01
title: Knock Back the Wolf Pack
desc: Expel the wolves that harass the town.

name: 普通委托-王国军线-第四章：固守小镇系列委托02
title: Eliminate the White Wolf King
desc: Eliminate the White Wolf King to reduce the attacks of the wolves on the town.

name: 普通委托-王国军线-第四章：固守小镇系列委托03（低优先级）
title: Knock Back the Wolf Pack
desc: Expel the wolves that harass the town.

name: 普通委托-王国军线-第四章：固守小镇系列委托04（低优先级）
title: Take back the Supplies
desc: The patrol has spotted a group of bandits attempting to steal supplies from the mercenary group.
condition1_name: Reclaim the supplies snatched by the bandits.

name: 普通委托-王国军线-第四章：固守小镇系列委托05（低优先级）
title: Emergency Mobilization
desc: Bandits raided the town as the mercenary group was doing maintenance for their equipment. Urgently distribute battle supplies and mobilize forces to counter the bandits.

name: 普通委托-王国军线-第四章：发展义军系列委托01（低优先级）
title: Live Exercise
desc: A gang of bandits infiltrated into the exercise field. Command the recruits to complete the live exercise.

name: 普通委托-王国军线-第四章：发展义军系列委托02
title: Add New Members
desc: During the patrol, you met a group of homeless mercenaries. Integrate them as the post-war supplementary manpower.

name: 普通委托-王国军线-第四章：发展义军系列委托03（低优先级）
title: Reformed Bandits
desc: Several bandits chose to break free from their group and join the Sword of Convallaria, but they ran into the vengeful bandit boss on the way…
failed_desc: All allies are defeated or mercenaries are defeated

name: 普通委托-王国军线-第四章：发展义军系列委托04（低优先级）
title: Quell the Riot
desc: The unrest has led to riots in certain regions. Try your best to calm the mob.
condition1_name: Successfully persuade all militiamen to join the Civil Army

name: 普通委托-王国军线-第四章：发展义军系列委托05（低优先级）
title: Tough Battle Training
desc: A training on how to break through enemy defense.

name: 普通委托-王国军线-第四章：发展义军系列委托06（低优先级）
title: Positional Warfare Training
desc: A training on how to manage positional warfare.

name: 王国军线-第三章：回援盟军快
title: Return to the Front Line
desc: Quickly return to the front line to support the allies, Vlder and Luccia, who have been resisting the strong attack for a long time.

name: 王国军线-第三章：回援盟军慢
title: Return to the Front Line
desc: Quickly return to the front line to support the allies, Vlder and Luccia, who have been resisting the strong attack for a long time.

name: 普通委托-共通线-第一章-追加1：战斗的理由
title: Reasons to Fight
desc: Some brave townspeople also want to defend their homeland on the front line. Now that they have completed some training, it is time to test them in a live exercise.

name: 普通委托-共通线-第一章-追加1：判断真凶1
title: Find the Culprit
desc: More people are missing in the nearby town. Go to find out the truth.

name: 普通委托-共通线-第一章-追加1：夜袭匪营
title: Night Attack on the Bandits' Camp
desc: Some bandits frequently attack the town recently, harassing the townspeople and looting grains. According to the intelligence, they have camped nearby. Go to stop the bandits from expansion.

name: 普通委托-共通线-第二章-追加1：矿坑三杰
title: Birds of a Feather
desc: Eliminate a group of outlaws who are doing evil near the Mine Pit.

name: 普通委托-共通线-第一章-追加1：判断真凶2
title: Find the Culprit
desc: More people are missing in the nearby town. Go to find out the truth.

name: 普通委托-共通线-第一章-追加1：追回物资
title: Take back the Supplies
desc: A group of outlaws snatched a batch of equipment. If they use the equipment for robbery, it will cause serious security problems. Go to take back the supplies or destroy them.

name: 普通委托-共通线-第一章-追加1：治疗伤兵
title: Save the Injured Soldiers
desc: Save the soldiers of the King's Army injured by poisoned arrows.
condition1_name: Heal all the wounded / defeat all enemies

name: 普通委托-共通线-第一章-追加1：判断真凶3
title: Find the Culprit
desc: More people are missing in the nearby town. Go to find out the truth.

name: 普通委托-共通线-第二章-追加1：拦截信使
title: Stop the Messenger
desc: You received a Quest from the King's Army to stop a messenger of the Union.

name: 普通委托-共通线-第二章-追加1：晶石样本
title: Collect the Samples
desc: The Papal States issued you a Quest to collect the Luxite samples they need at a Luxite mine.
condition1_name: Arrive at the destination / Defeat all enemies

name: 普通委托-共通线-第二章-追加1：营地协防
title: Rescue
desc: The Union issued you a Quest to cover a commander to retreat from the attack of the King's Army.

name: 普通委托-共通线-第二章-追加1：火场追捕
title: A Fatal Fire
desc: A group of mercenaries with unknown intentions set fire indiscriminately near Waverun City. Help the townspeople put out the fire and defeat the arsonists.

name: 普通委托-共通线-第二章-追加1：舌战
title: A Heated Dispute
desc: The Papal States issued you a Quest to go to the sanctuary, where a priest is bewitching people and causing trouble.

name: 重要委托-通用事件：小魔女晶石事件-感染玩法1
title: Beryl's Chess 1
desc: Direct your pieces to attack opponents and capture their pieces, while also taking care to protect your own pieces. You can use neutral pieces on the board to your advantage. Only the best thinking and strategic player will be the winner!

name: 重要委托-通用事件：小魔女晶石事件-感染玩法2
title: Beryl's Chess 2
desc: Direct your pieces to attack opponents and capture their pieces, while also taking care to protect your own pieces. You can use neutral pieces on the board to your advantage. Only the best thinking and strategic player will be the winner!

name: 重要委托-通用事件：小魔女晶石事件-感染玩法3
title: Beryl's Chess 3
desc: My secret technology will be completed soon! I just need to collect the last bit of battle data… Leader, let me see their limits!

name: 重要委托-通用事件：小魔女晶石事件-扫雷玩法1
title: Beryl's Treasure Hunter 1
desc: Be careful of the marks on the tile, and look for treasure chests buried in the corners. Meanwhile, be careful of the areas where hide the Luxite.

name: 重要委托-通用事件：小魔女晶石事件-扫雷玩法2
title: Beryl's Treasure Hunter 2
desc: Be careful of the marks on the tile, and look for treasure chests buried in the corners. Meanwhile, be careful of the areas where hide the Luxite.

name: 重要委托-通用事件：小魔女晶石事件-扫雷玩法3
title: Beryl's Treasure Hunter 3
desc: Be careful of the marks on the tile, and look for treasure chests buried in the corners. Meanwhile, be careful of the areas where hide the Luxite.

name: 重要委托-通用事件：小魔女晶石事件-竞猜玩法1
title: Beryl's Quiz 1
desc: Use your intelligence to guess which team will win in the confrontation. If you can get all 3 guesses right, then you are the winner of the game!

name: 重要委托-通用事件：小魔女晶石事件-竞猜玩法2
title: Beryl's Quiz 2
desc: Use your intelligence to guess which team will win in the confrontation. If you can get all 3 guesses right, then you are the winner of the game!

name: 重要委托-通用事件：小魔女晶石事件-竞猜玩法3
title: Beryl's Quiz 3
desc: Use your intelligence to guess which team will win in the confrontation. If you can get all 3 guesses right, then you are the winner of the game!

name: 重要委托-通用事件：小魔女晶石事件-推箱玩法1
title: Beryl's Pathfinder Game 1
desc: Push the obstacles on the map and pass through all the destinations within a limited time to win the game!

name: 重要委托-通用事件：小魔女晶石事件-推箱玩法2
title: Beryl's Pathfinder Game 2
desc: Push the obstacles on the map and pass through all the destinations within a limited time to win the game!

name: 重要委托-通用事件：小魔女晶石事件-推箱玩法3
title: Beryl's Pathfinder Game 3
desc: Push the obstacles on the map and pass through all the destinations within a limited time to win the game!

name: 王国军线-第三章：第一次抄家
title: Confiscate the Property
desc: You are going tosearch the home of an old aristocracy who participated in the rebellion. His bad attitude tells you that there will be fierce resistance.

name: 王国军线-第三章：抄秘密金库
title: The Secret Vault
desc: According to the clues provided by the old aristocracy's wife, you find a secret vault guarded by mercenaries in the wild.

name: QV3-P3-06-01攻占瞭望塔（里线信物版）
condition2_name: No more than 1 soldier of the Union is defeated
title: Take the Watchtower
desc:
A scout brings an intelligence: Gloria's troops are stationed somewhere near a watchtower of the King's Army. 
It seems that Gloria is ready to attack the watchtower, and if you do her a favor, her victory will be in sight.

name: QV3-P3-08-01与骑士团的共同作战（里线信物版）
condition2_name: Lutfi's soldiers are not all knocked back
title: Fight Together with the Order
desc: Fight together with the Order to destroy the supply base of the King's Army.

name: QV3-P4-10：针锋相对（里线信物版）
title: Tit for Tat
desc: Safiyyah and Gloria are at loggerheads, and a war of words is inevitable. The truth becomes more complicated and uncertain, but you should not easily change your mind.

name: 重要委托-王国军线-第一章：王国军线考验关01
title: [Trial] Accurate Action
desc: The Hanged Men requested your help to kill a senior officer of the Union who would appear in a hidden supply point.
condition1_name: Defeat the officers of The Union

name: 重要委托-王国军线-第二章：王国军线考验关02
title: [Trial] Stop the Smuggling
desc: You have targeted a smuggling team of Darklight. Killing them will reduce various illegal supplies in Iria.

name: 重要委托-王国军线-第一章：角色试玩关-莉莉薇儿
title: Dark Ritual
desc: Thanks to the Sword of Convallaria, Vlder Tribes is finally able to penetrate into the surrounding hinterland occupied by Darklight. The chieftain LilyWill will command the battle personally and completely end Darklight here to pay tribute to the dead Vlderians.

name: 法皇国线-第一章：作恶的黑光
title: Investigate the Mine Pit
desc: Go to the Mint Pit with Samantha to investigate the trace of the Darklight in the Mine Pit.
condition1_name: Defeat all enemies or save more than 3 civilians

name: 法皇国线-第一章：黑光追杀
title: Find Edda
desc: Find the whereabout of Edda and ask more information about the Mine Pit.
condition1_name: Arrive at the Specific Location / Defeat all enemies

name: 法皇国线-第一章：晶石矿洞之战
title: Liberate the Mine
desc: Expel the Darklight in the Mine, and liberate the people of the Mine Pit who are forced to do the heavy work of mining.
failed_desc: Over 1 miner is defeated/Samantha is defeated

title: Defuse the Conflict
desc: Quell the violent conflict between the Irian aristocrats and the rebels in the Mine Pit.
