desc: Perekin is drinking heavily at the tavern and is deeply drunk. You sense that someone is approaching with murderous intent. Find the assassin who intends to murder Perekin!
condition1_name: Find out all assassins and defeat them

name: 临时顶替-打击黑暗之光03（原普通委托-王国军线-第二章：打击黑暗之光03）
title: Pursue the Darklight Remnants
desc: Chase the members of the Darklight who escaped by chance. (Temporarily substitute stage, the content of the stage may deviate from the plot)

name: 临时顶替-打击黑暗之光04（原普通委托-王国军线-第二章：打击黑暗之光04）
title: Fugitives of Darklight
desc: Some stubborn members of the Darklight are preparing to return to their lost territory to do evil again. Eliminate their sense of luck completely. (Temporarily substitute stage, the content of the stage may deviate from the plot)

name: 法皇国线-第四章：晶石矿之乱战斗（没人帮+救赎1）
condition2_name: Fail to defeat any resisting soldier
title: Defuse the Conflict
desc: Quell the violent conflict between the Irian aristocrats and the rebels in the Mine Pit.

name: 普通委托-王国军线-第三章：凑齐赎金02 （旧·再利用）
title: [Trial] Triathlon
desc: An Elaman merchant is holding a triathlon, offering handsome rewards for the champion.

name: 重要委托-法皇国线-第五章-通用：荒废的城堡（考验关）
title: [Trial] Abandoned Castle
desc: Sword of Convallaria has received a special commission from the Mercenary Guild to wipe out a group of bandits squatting in a fortress. The Guild has issued repeated warnings stressing the danger of these bandits. It is said that many mercenaries have marched to their death for underestimating the enemy.

name: 埃拉曼线-第一章：解救阿坎贝
title: Distant Visitors
desc: A caravan from Elaman was surrounded by a band of robbers intent on thoroughly looting their cargo.

name: 埃拉曼线-第二章：费尔南多退兵
title: Great Robbery
desc: Darklight is surging toward the town, eager to snatch and destroy everything in its path…

name: 埃拉曼线-第三章：薇尔德-援建薇尔德R1G-解救奴隶（完成二王子晶石生意）
title: Liberating the Slaves
desc: A group of Vlderians fleeing from the slave owners are being hunted down. Help them find a way out.
condition1_name: Assist 2 or more 2 Vlderian slaves to escape
failed_desc: 2 or more Vlderian slaves are caught

name: 埃拉曼线-第三章：薇尔德-援建薇尔德R1G-解救奴隶（未完成二王子晶石生意）
title: Liberating the Slaves
desc: A group of Vlderians fleeing from the slave owners are being hunted down. Help them find a way out.
condition1_name: Assist 2 or more 2 Vlderian slaves to escape
failed_desc: 2 or more Vlderian slaves are caught

name: 埃拉曼线-第四章：对抗偷袭者
title: Surprise Attack
desc: The Miguel Mercenary Group has launched a sneak attack on the transport team of Convallaria Trading Post, and their posture makes you suspect there's more to this.

name: 埃拉曼线-第四章：鹦鹉人顶包
condition2_name: Homa takes damage no more than 3 times
title: Homa's Decisiveness
desc: Help Homa elude the Hanged Men.

name: 埃拉曼线-第四章：埋伏爱国商人
title: Arrest Kadar
desc: Join forces with Acambe to flush out Kadar who dares not show up openly.

name: 埃拉曼线-第四章：维护秩序
condition2_name: No more than 9 civilians join the riot
title: Maintain Order
desc: Ensure Inanna's safety and that the hearing can proceed smoothly.

name: 埃拉曼线-第五章：和二王子击败奥古斯特（米格尔支援）
title: Tough Negotiations
desc: Protect Lutfi and stop Auguste from taking back the key evidence of the Waverun City incident.

name: 埃拉曼线-第五章：和二王子击败奥古斯特（米格尔不支援）
title: Tough Negotiations
desc: Protect Lutfi and stop Auguste from taking back the key evidence of the Waverun City incident.

name: 埃拉曼线-第四章：救阿坎贝
title: Rescue Acambe
desc: You and Cocoa decide to help Acambe elude the Faceless.

name: 埃拉曼线-浪涌城路线-商会战斗委托01
title: Unpardonable Drunkenness
desc: A group of inebriated soldiers have become uncontrollable. Prevent them from wantonly destroying the cargo.

name: 埃拉曼线-浪涌城路线-商会战斗委托02
title: Assist in Training
desc: Since the Advance Order is willing to pay, we might as well demonstrate some hand-to-hand combat for them.

name: 埃拉曼线-浪涌城路线-商会战斗委托03
title: Stevedoring
desc: The loaders have had an accident, and this time we need to load and unload the cargo ourselves.
condition1_name: Move the wooden box to the side of the employee
failed_desc: Loading not completed within the time limit

name: 埃拉曼线-浪涌城路线-商会战斗委托04
condition2_name: Successfully inspect more than 3 passersby and the cargo is not destroyed
title: Inspection
desc: A checkpoint controlled by the Union needs extra inspectors. Seeing the good pay, we decide to help out.

name: 埃拉曼线-浪涌城路线-商会战斗委托05
condition2_name: The cargo is not destroyed and 2 prisoners are rescued
title: Slave Trade in Waverun City
desc: Someone in the Union is colluding with slave traders, shipping slaves across the sea. We caught them red-handed on our way back.

name: 埃拉曼线-浪涌城路线-商会战斗委托06
title: Fire at the Storage Yard
desc: A group of unknown mercenaries set the Waverun City storage yard ablaze.

name: 埃拉曼线-周边小镇路线-商会战斗委托01
condition2_name: No more than 7 explosive barrels are detonated
title: Search for Stolen Cargo
desc: Just as we were about to leave, the guards of Windyvale Town asked us to help catch the merchants who bought the stolen cargo and prepared to take them away.
failed_desc: More than 9 explosive barrels are detonated

name: 埃拉曼线-周边小镇路线-商会战斗委托02
title: Boulder Practice
desc: We occasionally need to review our Boulder skills, as you never know when bandits will happen to be on the necessary path of Boulder.

name: 埃拉曼线-周边小镇路线-商会战斗委托03
title: The Trapped Outlaw
desc: We resolved a crisis where the Outlaw looted a caravan, and now it's their turn to be in trouble.

name: 埃拉曼线-周边小镇路线-商会战斗委托04
title: Caught in a Clash
desc: On the trade route we passed, an encounter battle broke out between the King's Army and the Union.

name: 埃拉曼线-周边小镇路线-商会战斗委托05
title: Disguised Caravan
desc: Sometimes those who travel with us are bandits disguised as merchants, although they really didn't need to go through so much trouble, as the end is always the same.
condition1_name: Defeat the Outlaw Elite Ice Priest

name: 埃拉曼线-周边小镇路线-商会战斗委托06
title: Inventory Cleanup
desc: Lots of Purus popped up in the warehouse. What's going on?

name: 埃拉曼线-矿坑城路线-商会战斗委托01
title: Fundraising Fraud
desc: Hemp rope always breaks at its thinnest part, and fraud always targets the poor.
condition1_name: Solve the scam of the cunning merchant

name: 埃拉曼线-矿坑城路线-商会战斗委托02
title: Dangerous Play
desc: For an extra reward, we agreed to help miners detonate explosives, but unexpected guests have appeared.

name: 埃拉曼线-矿坑城路线-商会战斗委托03
title: Misunderstanding
desc: Our caravan in Mine Pit was stopped by a few angry young men.
condition1_name: Defeat all enemies/Get signatures before talking to enemies

name: 埃拉曼线-矿坑城路线-商会战斗委托04
title: Grain Thief
desc: The people of Mine Pit have been hovering around the poverty line for a long time, and theft targeting food is bound to happen. We're entrusted to deal with this issue.

name: 埃拉曼线-矿坑城路线-商会战斗委托05
title: Old Rival
desc: On the way to trade in Mine Pit, we encountered an old rival.

name: 埃拉曼线-矿坑城路线-商会战斗委托06
title: Worried Miner's Wife
desc: While we were going to the mines to receive a batch of Luxite, remnants of Darklight appeared, planning to steal the Luxite and sacrifice the miner.
failed_desc: The miner's wife is not defeated

name: 埃拉曼线-拉比亚绿洲路线-商会战斗委托01
title: Desert Bandits
desc: A relentless group of bandits in the desert have caught up with your caravan, and you have to stop and fight them.

name: 埃拉曼线-拉比亚绿洲路线-商会战斗委托02
title: Desert Spring
desc: A precious spring in the desert has been forcefully occupied by bandits, who extort money from the local populace with it.

name: 埃拉曼线-拉比亚绿洲路线-商会战斗委托03
title: Desert Treasure Hunt
desc: To avoid a storm, a merchant traveling with us hid his treasure somewhere in the desert. After the storm, he forgot its location.
failed_desc: Fail to find within the time limit

name: 埃拉曼线-拉比亚绿洲路线-商会战斗委托04
title: Desert Wolves
desc: A pack of hungry predators have been lying in wait in the desert for a long time…

name: 埃拉曼线-拉比亚绿洲路线-商会战斗委托05
title: Greedy Slave Traders
desc: The ambition of the slave traders is growing, and they have even started targeting the Mercenary Group.

name: 埃拉曼线-拉比亚绿洲路线-商会战斗委托06
title: Monster Gambling
desc: Puru Athletics is a very new culture; catching this trend might add a lot to the conversation in trading.

name: 埃拉曼线-黑暗之光路线-商会战斗委托01
title: Internal Disagreement
desc: The Darklight Fanatics have quarreled over some differences of opinion, and you plan to continue inciting them to avoid trouble as much as possible.

name: 埃拉曼线-黑暗之光路线-商会战斗委托02
title: Psychological Tactics
desc: We try to intimidate a group of wavering Darklight members, defeating them without striking a blow.

name: 埃拉曼线-黑暗之光路线-商会战斗委托03
title: Lurking Danger
desc: An informant comes to escort you through a dangerous area, but you sense malice in his intentions…

name: 埃拉曼线-晨曦堡路线-商会战斗委托01
title: Suspicious Cargo
desc: A sneaky merchant dumps a batch of cargo on you and then flees. What exactly is inside…?

name: 埃拉曼线-晨曦堡路线-商会战斗委托02
title: Catch Escapees
desc: Help the prison guards catch the escaped smugglers.
failed_desc: More than 2 fugitives escape from prison

name: 埃拉曼线-晨曦堡路线-商会战斗委托03
title: Inside Job
desc: We completed a deal with the logistics of Mornrays Castle's army, and just when we were about to leave after settling accounts, a small "accident" occurred…

name: 埃拉曼线-暮光城路线-商会战斗委托01
title: Power Test
desc: The Papal States has developed a solvent for Puru, inviting us to help test its effects.

name: 埃拉曼线-暮光城路线-商会战斗委托02
title: Super Purification
desc: During a deal with the Papal States, we encountered a group of people infected with a strange disease.

name: 埃拉曼线-暮光城路线-商会战斗委托03
title: Major Effort
desc: Some of the cargo we sent to Lightgloam City included health products for nobles of the Papal States. They seem to take this type of product too seriously.

name: 埃拉曼线-薇尔德路线-商会战斗委托01
title: Slave Hunter
desc: When our caravan left Vltar Mountain, we happened to observe a trail of slave transportation. We do not mind stopping this unscrupulous behavior.

name: 埃拉曼线-薇尔德路线-商会战斗委托02
title: Drive Away Wolves
desc: Our caravan was surrounded by wolves on the way back at night. Fortunately, we know how to drive away the wolves of Vltar Mountain.
condition1_name: Hold your ground for 6 rounds or light 3 braziers

name: 埃拉曼线-薇尔德路线-商会战斗委托03
title: Ascent
desc: Climbing seems to be a popular sport among Vlderians. Maybe we can also join their competition to gain some fame.
condition1_name: An ally reaches the destination first
failed_desc: An enemy reaches the destination first

name: 埃拉曼线-共通路线-商会战斗委托01
title: Gather Herbs
desc: Help injured civilians gather healing herbs.
condition1_name: After gathering herbs, give them to the injured civilians

name: 埃拉曼线-共通路线-商会战斗委托02
title: Drive Away Bandits
desc: Drive away the Outlaw trying to rob the temporary storage point.
failed_desc: Any enemy crosses the warning line

name: 埃拉曼线-共通路线-商会战斗委托03
title: Clever Recovery
desc: The precious medicinal materials lost by Convallaria Trading Post were hidden in the thieves' loot. Carefully check the cargo crates and be aware of dangerous items mixed in.
condition1_name: Find 5 or more bottles of medicine

name: 埃拉曼线-共通路线-商会战斗委托04
title: Wolves in the Way
desc: A pack of wild wolves blocked the way of the merchants.

name: 埃拉曼线-共通路线-商会战斗委托05
title: Strange Martial Artist
desc: The caravan encounters a strange fellow near the campsite where we rest on the journey.

name: 埃拉曼线-共通路线-商会战斗委托06
title: Bridge Contest
desc: Our returning caravan is stuck in a difficult position and must fight.

name: 埃拉曼线-高战争倾向-商会战斗委托01
title: People in Chaos
desc: The situation is getting more chaotic, and among those who stop us on the road, some strange people have begun to appear.

name: 埃拉曼线-高战争倾向-商会战斗委托02
title: Infiltration
desc: As the war between the King's Army and the Union drags on, infiltration between the two is becoming severe.

name: 埃拉曼线-高战争倾向-商会战斗委托03
condition2_name: The cargo is not destroyed and no scavenger escapes
title: Turnover in a Snowstorm
desc: Our caravan turned over at the least or perhaps most suitable time.

name: 埃拉曼线-定制商单-周边小镇-稳定粮价R2B-粮食投机雇佣兵
title: Endless Trifles
desc: After you stabilized the price of food, Convallaria Trading Post was troubled by some issues…

name: 埃拉曼线-定制商单-浪涌城-恶意竞争R1B-被陷害通敌
title: False Accusation
desc: Convallaria Trading Post's business is looking up, but along with high profits, rumors and slanders follow…
condition1_name: Defeat all enemies/Hold your ground for 8 rounds

name: 埃拉曼线-定制商单-拉比亚绿洲-开拓市场R2B-龙门客栈
title: Malicious Breach of Contract
desc: When you are ready to complete the delivery with Mr. Know-it-all, he suddenly starts creating difficulties for you, and a conflict is inevitable.
failed_desc: 5 or more cargo is destroyed/All allies have been defeated

name: 埃拉曼线-定制商单-周边小镇-重型武器出现R2B-威胁信号
title: Threatening Signal
desc: A well-equipped mercenary troop has come to you, claiming to "teach you a lesson" on behalf of their "employer".

name: 埃拉曼线-定制商单-浪涌城-二王子晶石生意R1B-拦路检查
title: Roadblock Inspection
desc: Your caravan is stopped by King's Army on the way back from Waverun City, and they levy a high tax out of nowhere… How to refuse this unreasonable demand?

name: 埃拉曼线-定制商单-矿坑城-恢复晶石生产R2B-开矿（有重装武器）
title: Open New Vein
desc: A new Luxite vein has been discovered in Mine Pit; however, these abundant Luxite are not only surrounded by solid rocks, but also prowling monsters lurking in the caves.

name: 埃拉曼线-定制商单-矿坑城-恢复晶石生产R2B-开矿（无重装武器）
title: Open New Vein
desc: A new Luxite vein has been discovered in Mine Pit; however, these abundant Luxite are not only surrounded by solid rocks, but also prowling monsters lurking in the caves.

name: 埃拉曼线-定制商单-浪涌城-二王子晶石生意R3B-和薇尔德人冲突
title: Unidentified Attack
desc: The transport team of Convallaria Trading Post has been attacked by an unidentified assailant. Head to the site to investigate.
condition1_name: Subjugate 9 or more Vlderians/Hold your ground for 9 rounds

name: 埃拉曼线-定制商单-周边小镇-援建周边小镇R1B-黑暗之光蛊惑
title: Seduction of Darklight
desc: Darklight is trying to incite a group of civilians to do something crazy.
failed_desc: A civilian is attacked or Edda is defeated

name: 埃拉曼线-定制商单-周边小镇-援建周边小镇R2B-王国军拉壮丁
title: Draft Conflict
desc: Because the King's Army draft officer wants to take away the few young people from a small town, there is quite a conflict.
failed_desc: More than 3 civilians leave the town

name: 埃拉曼线-定制商单-周边小镇-援建周边小镇R3B-骑士团收买
title: Illegal Recruitment
desc: The Union is recruiting the poor people of Iria to go to the front line. Prevent innocent people from getting involved in the war.
failed_desc: A civilian is defeated or a Union Soldier reaches the destination

name: （废弃）
title: （废弃）
desc: 暂无

name: 埃拉曼线-定制商单-黑暗之光-帮助黑光改邪归正R1
title: Eliminate Darklight
desc: With more and more followers dissatisfied with Darklight, now is a great opportunity to settle accounts with this evil organization.

name: 埃拉曼线-共通路线-商会战斗委托07
title: Night Watch
desc: We failed to leave enough hands on guard at night, so…

name: 埃拉曼线-共通路线-商会战斗委托08
title: Market Shopping
desc: On the way back, we took inventory and found that we need to stop in a nearby town to get supplies.

name: 埃拉曼线-共通路线-商会战斗委托09
title: Local Bully
desc: We try to grow the business in an unfamiliar market, and the process will not be easy.

name: 埃拉曼线-招募事件-埃拉曼剑盾兵
condition2_name: Less than 5 Elaman soldiers are defeated and the cargo is not destroyed
title: Market Is Battlefield
desc: An Elamanian is willing to join our mercenary group, as long as we help him complete an order, which seems easy for us.
failed_desc: Over 7 Elaman soldiers are defeated/Arman is defeated

name: 埃拉曼线-招募事件-埃拉曼不朽双刀兵
title: Betrayal of the Immortal
desc: We decide to help an Elamanian break away from the Faceless. Perhaps he will consider joining us afterward.
condition1_name: Defeat all the Faceless and merchants

name: 埃拉曼线-考验关01
title: [Trial] Snatching Herbs from Wolves
desc: To collect some herbs, we have to deal with some unfriendly animals.
condition1_name: Defeat all enemies or investigate all destinations

name: 埃拉曼线-考验关02
title: [Trial] Breakout
desc: Our caravan is besieged by bandits and Darklight at the same time, and we need to seek a breakthrough immediately.
condition1_name:
Defeat the Bandit Boss
or defeat the Darklight conjurer

name: 埃拉曼线-考验关03
title: [Trial] Fanatic
desc: We arrived at one of the trade stops only to find that it had been leveled by Darklight.

name: 埃拉曼线-考验关04
title: [Trial] Protecting Luxite
desc: The unprecedentedly viral Luxite business has also attracted many professional "Luxite Hunters" who specialize in attacking Luxite caravans.
condition1_name: Hold your ground for 6 rounds or defeat the Mercenary Boss

name: 埃拉曼线-考验关05
title: [Trial] Recapturing Cargo
desc: Our caravan is harassed by Luxite Hunters, so we plan to execute a bold plan, placing a small amount of Luxite and a large number of Luxite explosive barrels in the cargo crates.
condition1_name: Eliminate all bandits except the Boss and then approach him
